short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enable Digital Collateral Presentation Tool iFrame Functionality

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Streamline your presentations by unifying all your PowerPoint, PDF, URL, and media resources in one browser-based tool.

This extension bypasses Access-Control-Allow-Headers and X-Frame-Options for the app.digitalcollateral.com domain only- which is necessary for some sites that attempt to prevent themselves from being rendered in an iframe.

Since you're choosing the URLs to use in your slideshow, and the plugin only affects traffic on the app.digitalcollateral.com domain, it's safe to leave the plugin installed even when you're not presenting.

When you're creating your slides, we'll check to see if the extension is installed and prompt you to do so.
